newsentry.title: MyCoRe-Workshop
newsentry.message: Announcement and invitation: The MyCoRe Workshop will take place at 11. Nov. 2015 at the University Library Ilmenau.
newsentry.author: Wiebke Oeltjen

newsentry.title: Conference
newsentry.message: MyCoRe was presented at the "FORGE 2015" conference in Hamburg: "research data in the humanities".
newsentry.author: Wiebke Oeltjen

newsentry.title: Release 2015.07

newsentry.title: Application
newsentry.message: The Repository "ViFa-Recht" is now online. <IntR>²Dok is the first MIR-Application.
